message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you an exclusive opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it holds significant value for you, and I'm willing to part with it for $1,350,000.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to meet the $1,350,000 price point. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1,200,000.
Bob, I understand your position.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $1,275,000.  I believe this price reflects the true value of the product and is a fair offer for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to counter with an offer of $1,225,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with our respective values.
